ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Ronald L. Berger ** RETIREMENT AND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. RONALD L. BERGER, a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal of Alberta, effective October 26, 2018.
